mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, QNA_TYPE, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, USER_ID, QNA_CNT, QNA_TIME, REF, DEPTH, STEP, SECRET, PASSWORD FROM QNA ORDER BY REF DESC, STEP ASC LIMIT #{perPageNum} OFFSET #{startRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA ( QNA_TYPE, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, USER_ID, QNA_CNT, QNA_TIME, REF, DEPTH, STEP, SECRET, PASSWORD ) VALUES( #{qna_type}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{user_id}, 0, now(), COALESCE((SELECT MAX(ref) FROM QNA),0), 0, 0, #{secret}, #{password})
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET QNA_TYPE = #{qna_type}, QNA_TITLE = #{qna_title}, QNA_CONTENT = #{qna_content}, QNA_CNT = (SELECT MAX(QNA_CNT) FROM QNA WHERE QNA_NO = #{qna_no}), QNA_TIME = (SELECT QNA_TIME FROM QNA WHERE QNA_NO = #{qna_no}), REF = (SELECT REF FROM QNA WHERE QNA_NO = #{qna_no}), DEPTH = (SELECT DEPTH FROM QNA WHERE QNA_NO = #{qna_no}), STEP = (SELECT STEP FROM QNA WHERE QNA_NO = #{qna_no}), SECRET = #{secret}, PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE QNA_NO =#{qna_no}
